name: Stack Color Ball: Smash & Bump
description:
Welcome to Stack Color Ball, this is a 3d casual click game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving spiral tower to reach the end.

Exciting and addicting adventure of the bouncing ball through the spiral tower. One tap and easy to control!!!


Game Features:

- More addictive gameplay
- Amazing graphics
- Easy to play
- Crazy fast speed
- Never ending levels
- Fun and relaxing to play
- Bright effects


Enjoy playing our ball game! Download now!!!
